contents.text: WE HAVE TWO covers this week. In most of the world we ponder what the rise of AI chatbots mean for the lucrative business of searching the internet.
Leaders: The battle for internet searchBusiness: Is Google’s 20-year dominance of search in peril?
In Asia, on the other hand, we consider what lessons corporate India, and others, should learn from the woes of Gautam Adani.
Leader: The humbling of Gautam Adani is a test for Indian capitalismBriefing: Why Adani Group’s troubles will reverberate across India
